divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside the nursing home i work at to have a cigarette at approximately 4 am and noticed a bright light just beyond the trees, there was no noise as i thougt at first it was probably a helicopter but it moved left to right very fast and it got brighter the closer it got. when it moved very quickly sideways again and just shot up in the sky till it disappeared. i was so stunned and scared at what i had just seen that while it was in front of me i couln't even move. when it left i threw my cigarette and ran inside. i am not a believer but i saw something i won't soon forget. the area i work in is not closely populated, it is old farm land surrounded by woods
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bridgewater
There were no other sightings in Bridgewater on or around November 10th 2008
Summary: i went outside for a cigarette and was just looking up at the sky through the trees, object came my way, i saw it through the trees
